title: Delhi High Court assigns special CBI court to speed up trial in biggest bank fraud
description: The Delhi High Court appointed a special CBI Court to speed up the trial of India's largest bank fraud case involving Dewan Housing Finance Ltd (DHFL). Promoters Dheeraj and Kapil Wadhawan are accused in the Rs 34,614 crore loan fraud case. The CBI submitted a chargesheet with over 330,000 pages, indicting 108 individuals/entities.
